class_notes: Travel to Spain May 14- May 25. Permission of Instructor Required.
course_description: This class looks at the relationship between various social structures¿the state, the economy, educational institutions, and public health¿to examine the relationship between social structures and well-being. It hinges, in part, on comparative work between different industrialized democracies, focusing on the United States and its peer countries in Europe.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 5294, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: T 2:30-5:15p, Instructor: Shannon/Yu-Nguyen, Status: Closed
